positive_examples: This is an example of cluster boundary.
The cluster boundary demonstrated clear characteristics.
We observed cluster boundary in this context.
A typical case of cluster boundary would involve these features.
The concept of cluster boundary applies here.
The perimeter that defines the extent and membership of grouped or clustered conceptual elements.
negative_examples: This is an example of decision boundary, not cluster boundary.
This represents concept boundary in general.
The document was filed in the cabinet.
She walked to the store to buy groceries.
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: DecisionBoundary, or other types of ConceptBoundary

definition: A threshold separating different groupings or clusters in data space.
